control-tag.name: upsProperties
control-tag.description: Properties relating to the UPS Shipment Tracking Control.

attribute.name: accessCode
attribute.description: An access code string provided when you register with UPS, required to use their Web Services.

attribute.name: username
attribute.description: The username you chose when registering with UPS, required to use their Web Services.

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: The password you chose when registering with UPS, required to use their Web Services.

attribute.name: serverUrl
attribute.description: The URL at which the UPS Tracking Web Service Server listens. Defaults to "https://www.ups.com/ups.app/xml/Track".
